member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.StyleUsageMode
member.summary: Value indicating whether styles will be applied implicitly or explicitly

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.StyleUsageMode.Explicit
member.summary: Styles will be applied explicitly. (Defined styles will not be overridden.)

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.ThemeResourceDictionary
member.summary: Represents a generic theme resource dictionary.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.ThemeResourceDictionary.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the license key used to license the classes contained in the Xceed.Wpf.Themes assembly.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.ThemeResourceDictionary.StyleUsageMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode that will be used by the theme resource dictionary.
